long_description: The Thule Force XXL roof box features an aerodynamic design with textured skin and ample amounts of room to haul your gear to the mountains or ocean for weekend getaways. Aerodynamic shape and the diamond-textured skin on lid of roof box help reduce drag. Tool-free QuickGrip(TM) mounting system comes pre-installed so you'll be on the road in seconds. QuickGrip system can be mounted on square and round crossbars and most factory racks (see Fit List); attaches with a single, 1-handed motion. Patented, dual-side openings let you access your gear from either side of the box. Locking system features an external lock-assist knob that is easy to use; built-in safety feature means the key can only be removed when the box is fully closed. User-friendly locking system includes an oversize key; a lock is located on each side of the box, and each lock comes with 2 keys. Thule Force XXL roof box holds 10 - 12 pairs of skis or 6 - 8 snowboards.
short_description: The Thule Force XXL roof box features an aerodynamic design with textured skin and ample amounts of room to haul your gear to the mountains or ocean for weekend getaways.
